frame.name: Examination
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame deals with testing or examination of someone's <fen>Knowledge</fen> or skill in a particular area. An <fen>Examiner</fen> conducts an <fen>Examination</fen> to an <fen>Examinee</fen> to determine the <fen>Examinee</fen>'s <fen>Knowledge</fen> and/or determine their <fen>Qualification</fen> for some privilege; this proceeds either by the <fen>Examinee</fen> demonstrating a skill or by writing responses to questions. </def-root>

FE.name: Examiner
FE.definition: <def-root>One who administers a test of some kind.<ex><fex name="Exmr">The teacher</fex> <t>tested</t> the students.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Examinee
FE.definition: <def-root>One who undergoes a test of some kind.<ex><fex name="Exmee">The students</fex> took a <t>test</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Knowledge
FE.definition:
<def-root>The ability, practice, or command of information on which an <fen>Examinee</fen> is tested.
<ex>I took my <fex name="Knowledge">driving</fex> <t>test</t>.</ex> <ex>Is there anything more odious than a <fex name="kno">History</fex> test strictly on dates ?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Qualification
FE.definition: <def-root>A credential or status that one acquires by passing an <fen>Examination</fen>.<ex><fex name="Exmee">He</fex> <m>took</m> the <fex name="Qualification">college entrance</fex> <fex name="Examination"><t>exam</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Examination
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Examination</fen> that somebody takes.<ex><fex name="Examination">The examination</fex> <t>tests</t> driving skills.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act whereby the <fen>Examiner</fen> assesses the <fen>Examinee</fen>. <ex>The sarge <t>tested</t> him <fex name="Mns">by having him take his rifle apart and put it back together</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Examiner</fen> wants to bring about by giving the <fen>Examinee</fen> the <fen>Examination</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the examination takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the examination occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Examiner</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

lexUnit.name: test.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a short examination of proficiency

lexUnit.name: examination.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a formal test of [knowledge or] proficiency in a subject or skill

lexUnit.name: test.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: subject to a test (of proficiency)

lexUnit.name: examine.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: test the [knowledge or] proficiency of

lexUnit.name: exam.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: short for examination: a formal test of proficiency in a subject or skill
